name: Jet Shooter
description:
You'll ride your jet to collect the highest rank/score. To save your life is to shoot all the enemies which will appears around you. The asteroids & spaces are your enemies. It'll comes into varieties size from big to small.

Features:
* Use button move up, down, right & left to move up, down, right or left side.
* Shoot all the enemies like asteroids, stone & others.
* Click on your mouse to shoot the enemies.
* Your life will be ended when you're hit up with any bullets from enemies.
* Press button R to restart play this game when you're in game over.

Good luck! Survive your life!
